headline: Is Martin Marietta Materials (MLM) Pricing In Too Much Construction Growth?
summary: If you are wondering whether Martin Marietta Materials' current share price lines up with its underlying value, this article will walk through the key signals that matter for you as a long term investor. The stock last closed at US$651.95, with returns of 0.0% over 7 days, 2.8% over 30 days, 2.8% year to date, 22.3% over 1 year and 123.5% over 5 years, which can shape how you think about both upside potential and risk today. headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights Vulcan Materials and Martin Marietta Materials
summary: Vulcan Materials stands to gain as sustained infrastructure spending and firm pricing power fuel multi-year growth in concrete and aggregates.

headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid MLM and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Martin Marietta Materials has followed the market’s trajectory closely, rising in tandem with the S&P 500 over the past six months. The stock has climbed by 8.1% to $651.10 per share while the index has gained 10%.
